sentences.en: As an octopus, a squid, or a cuttlefish moves around a reef in the ocean, it instantly camouflages itself against the background.
sentences.cn: 当海洋中的章鱼、鱿鱼、墨鱼游绕在暗礁处时，它们可以立即变身成暗礁的颜色来伪装自己。

sentences.en: Extensive use of side dishes of rice, with meat, oysters, cuttlefish, frog, mushrooms and so on.
sentences.cn: 配菜广泛使用大米, 配以肉 、 牡蛎 、 乌贼、田鸡 、 蘑菇等.

sentences.en: Fish , clam, cuttlefish, shrimp and octopus flavored with white wine and saffron.
sentences.cn: 蛤、花枝 、 虾仁 、 蟹肉、章鱼,以鱼汤、白酒与西班牙红花入味.

sentences.en: For toothpaste I used washed-up cuttlefish bone with wild fennel seeds, an oddity for a vegan.
sentences.cn: 我使用洗过的墨鱼骨头做牙刷，野生茴香籽做牙膏（素食主义者的古怪用品）。

sentences.en: I have no idea about how to prepare those cuttlefish and lobsters.
sentences.cn: 我对如何烹调那些乌贼和龙虾毫无概念.

sentences.en: In fact, cuttlefish hurt very serious.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 文花枝伤得非常严重.

sentences.en: Ingredients: Crap Fish , Prawns, Mussels , Mixed Ball , Sliced Chicken, Bacon & Cuttlefish.
sentences.cn: 配料: 生鱼片 、 中虾 、 青口 、 双丸、鸡片 、 烟肉卷、鲜鱿.

sentences.en: Remove cuttlefish when cooled, slice and serve with the sauce.
sentences.cn: 墨鱼熟后, 取出切件,淋上芡汁,趁热品尝.

sentences.en: Seafood With Frozen, That Are Including Cuttlefish, Squid, Clam Meat, Shrimp, Frozen Fresh Water Grouper Seafood.
sentences.cn: 采购产品海鲜与冻结, 即是包括乌贼, 鱿鱼, 文蛤肉, 虾, 冷冻淡水石斑鱼海鲜.

sentences.en: Shrimp, octopus, clam, cuttlefish and crabmeat cooked with tomato sauce and Black Forest apple tea.
sentences.cn: 虾仁 、 章鱼 、 蛤 、 花枝、蟹肉,佐茄汁与黑森林苹果茶.

sentences.en: Still feel in cuttlefish great dallis with seabird during, mew dives and fall, hold fish readily.
sentences.cn: 还在乌贼觉得得意地玩弄海鸟之际, 海鸥俯冲而下, 一口把乌贼叼走了.

sentences.en: The cuttlefish escaped by beclouding the water with an inky discharge.
sentences.cn: 乌贼喷射黑色物体,使水混浊,藉以逃脱.

sentences.en: The cuttlefish spurts out dark ink when it is in danger.
sentences.cn: 乌鲗遇到危险的时候会喷出黑色液体.

sentences.en: The cuttlefish's egg gland contains a lot of protein, and is regarded as a choice seafood.
sentences.cn: 乌鱼蛋含有大量蛋白质, 一向被视为海味珍品.

sentences.en: The hallow tomato stuffed with mango paste, cuttlefish, shrimp, crabmeat, octopus, and fish slices.
sentences.cn: 蕃茄肉身崁入芒果泥和海鲜馅, 包括花枝 、 虾仁 、 蟹肉 、 章鱼 、 鱼片.

sentences.en: The ink of cuttlefish beclouded the water.
Thiscombination of moulded pork fat and thick white cuttlefish takes some chewingbut, served in a good broth of spring onions, is delicious.
sentences.cn: 这种用肥猪肉和厚厚的白色的墨鱼混合而成的丸子十分耐嚼，配以很好的小葱汤，非常地美味。

trans.tran_en: a sea creature with ten soft arms
